THESE LINKS and their archived web pages are intended for a Reviews section of the EKS.net website, to be created at some future point. Some of the links were found by Sarah, and some more recently by Hal and T. 

Fields: 
Link name from EKS.net
Item name in  Zotero (Zotero gets from remote site)
Index file name in Zotero folder
Folder name in Zotero library 
URL for archived site as it will appear in EKS.net

abbreviated as:
Link:   
Item:   
Index:  
Folder: 
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/archive/writing// [modify as necessary]


Link:   Melissa Gregg, The Electronic Book Review [Touching Feeling]
Item:   How to Avoid Being Paranoid | Electronic Book Review
Index:  beside.html
Folder: 3BMKJ9RB
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/archive/writing/3BMKJ9RB/beside.html

Link:   Publishers Weekly [Touching Feeling]
Item:   Nonfiction Book Review: Touching Feeling: Affect, Pedagogy, Performativity by Eve Kosofsky Sedgwick, Author, Eve Kosofskysedgwick, Author, Michele Ainabarale, Editor Duke University Press $22.95 (208p) ISBN 978-0-8223-3015-8
Index:  978-0-8223-3015-8.html
Folder: IZGKFIHG
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/archive/writing/IZGKFIHG/978-0-8223-3015-8.html

Link:   Marla Morris, Journal of the History of Sexuality [Touching Feeling]
Item:   see note, below
Index:  3704866.pdf
Folder: NonZoteroPDFs
URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/archive/writing/NonZoteroPDFs/3704866.pdf
Note: Non-Zotero item from CUNY GC JStor, Journal of the History of Sexuality, Vol. 13, No. 2 (Apr., 2004), pp. 263-266

Link:   Elaine Showalter, London Review of Books [Touching Feeling]
Item:   Vibrating to the Chord of Queer

URL:    http://evekosofskysedgwick.net/externals/archive/writing/A68FNRBN/vibrating-to-the-chord-of-queer.html
